name: My Nikocado +
description:
*Sniff Sniff*

Do You Smell That?

ITS A BRAND NEW MY NIKOCADO GAME!

With Brand New Stuff! All is Well!

               {New Features!}

Days!- You know Minecraft Hardcore Days Right? Well This Just Like it! You Start on day 1 but Every 2 minutes a new day goes by!

WARNING!- The new WARNING Sign! If Your hunger Is Going down to much, you'll Recieve A Notiflication!

There are new stuff to the Phone, but we'll let you figure that out yourself! ;)
